# myprac

**myprac** is a Python library containing 5 AI & DS practical programs.  
Each practical can be viewed using the `show_code()` function.

## ðŸ“˜ Usage
```python
import myprac

# List all available practicals
myprac.list_practicals()

# View a specific practicalâ€™s code
myprac.show_code("prac3")
